item_title: Coinbase vs the SEC, Layer 2 metrics and more - The Daily Gwei Refuel #599 - Ethereum Updates
item_body_clean: The Daily Gwei Refuel gives you a recap every week day on everything that happened in the Ethereum and crypto ecosystems over the previous 24 hours - hosted by Anthony Sassano.
